Package com.github.jonathanxd.iutils.reflection Description

Reflection utilities. Links and Invokables is an unification of java.lang.invoke and java.lang.reflect APIs. Links is a link to an Invokable element, Invokable may be: - Lambdas: Dynamic Invocation - MethodHandle: New Java invocation API, more faster than Reflection. - Field, Method, Constructor, etc..: Java Reflection elements. Links can be used to inject dependencies (DI).
